item.title: Calvin Harris,Sam Smith - Promises
item.description:
Are you drunk
enough
Not to judge
what I’m doin’
Are you high
enough
To excuse
that I’m ruined
‘Cause
I’m ruined
Is it late
enough
For you to come
and stay over
‘Cause
we’re free to love
So tease me
hmm
I make
no promises
I can’t do
golden rings
But I’ll give you
everything(tonight)
Magic is
in the air
There ain’t
no science here
So come get your
everything(tonight)

no promises
I can’t do
golden rings
But I’ll give you
everything(tonight)

in the air
There ain’t
no science here
So come get your
everything(tonight)

everything tonight)

‘cause my body is
Calling for you
calling for you

to do the things
That I do

energy’s taking
Control

dancing alone

no promises
